contact.title: Contact Us
contact.preview: contact us using the form below

getInvolved.subtitle: Trained Volunteering
getInvolved.description: We provide extensive training to qualified volunteers interested in staffing our Resource & Crisis Helpline or Youth Residential Programs.

getInvolved.subtitle: Fundraising Events
getInvolved.description: The annual Birmingham Street Art Fair is our largest fundraiser, and we're always looking for enthusiastic volunteers to help make it a success.

getInvolved.subtitle: Community Outreach
getInvolved.description: We're always striving to increase awareness of Common Ground and our services. Help Spread the word at events throughout our community.

index.title: We listen. We care. We help.
index.lowerTitle: At Common Ground, we're dedicated to helping people move from crisis to hope.

getHelpOpts.name: call-helps
getHelpOpts.title: CALL
getHelpOpts.description: Are you facing a crisis? Call us for free and confidential counseling, information, and referrals

getHelpOpts.name: visit-helps
getHelpOpts.title: VISIT
getHelpOpts.description: You're also welcome to visit one of our Oakland County facilities to talk with us in person.

getHelpOpts.name: text-helps
getHelpOpts.title: TEXT
getHelpOpts.description: If you're not ready to talk, you can use a mobile phone to text with us instead. Available from 4pm to 10pm Monday through Friday

getHelpOpts.name: chat-helps
getHelpOpts.title: CHAT
getHelpOpts.description: From 4pm to 10pm Monday through Friday, you can use our online chat service
